targets.expr: sum by(protocol, io_type, data_type) (rate(qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_sum{instance=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(protocol, io_type, data_type) (rate(qumulo_protocol_operation_latency_seconds_count{instance=~"$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))

list.description: The Prometheus instance to query OpenMetrics from
list.name: datasource
